column1: The Pit Room////The place has a cool vibe
column2: very different from the old-school bbq joints. We had brisket and ribs here. While the brisket was very good
column3: the ribs were awful. It was chewy and lacked the texture of perfectly cooked ribs. We asked the folks to replace the ribs with another serving of brisket
column4: and they courteously obliged. The sides were pretty good too!
